https://github.com/kashif/tf-keras-tutorial/blob/master/7-estimators-multi-gpus.ipynb Is this the sign of what we are heading? Xiaoyun

On Thu, Jul 12, 2018 at 4:19 PM, Xiaoyun Wu ***@***.***> wrote: but pytorch is ahead of us for so long, we need to have some solution. Xiaoyun On Thu, Jul 12, 2018 at 7:26 AM, Asim Shankar ***@***.***> wrote: > @xiaoyunwu <https://github.com/xiaoyunwu> - Unfortunately, no concrete > update yet. However, the intent is to keep this in line with graph > execution via the distribution strategy APIs > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute> > and integrate that with the tf.keras classes so that the same code works > for both graph and eager execution. > > — > You are receiving this because you were mentioned. > Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub > <#16093 (comment)>, > or mute the thread > <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AFOFUa2AthRF1p2rhHGJUQhUK6kKGKE3ks5uFomlgaJpZM4RdFUg> > . >

https://github.com/kashif/tf-keras-tutorial/blob/master/7-estimators-multi-gpus.ipynb

Is this the sign of what we are heading?

Xiaoyun

On Thu, Jul 12, 2018 at 4:19 PM, Xiaoyun Wu ***@***.***> wrote:
 but pytorch is ahead of us for so long, we need to have some solution.

 Xiaoyun

 On Thu, Jul 12, 2018 at 7:26 AM, Asim Shankar ***@***.***>
 wrote:

> @xiaoyunwu <https://github.com/xiaoyunwu> - Unfortunately, no concrete
> update yet. However, the intent is to keep this in line with graph
> execution via the distribution strategy APIs
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute>
> and integrate that with the tf.keras classes so that the same code works
> for both graph and eager execution.
>
> —

https://github.com/kashif/tf-keras-tutorial/blob/master/7-estimators-multi-gpus.ipynb

Is this the sign of what we are heading?

Xiaoyun

On Thu, Jul 12, 2018 at 4:19 PM, Xiaoyun Wu <xiaoyun.wu@gmail.com> wrote:

> but pytorch is ahead of us for so long, we need to have some solution.
>
> Xiaoyun
>

> wrote:

>> execution via the distribution strategy APIs
>> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute>
>> and integrate that with the tf.keras classes so that the same code works
>> for both graph and eager execution.
